not.text:
Dear LSS-Manager user,
unfortunately the LSSM supports your current browser {name} not official! This means that it is not guaranteed that all functionalities will work properly. You can find a list of the browsers we support in our FAQ.
not.title: Not supported browser

old.text:
You seem to use an outdated browser! Currently you are using {name} {current}, but the latest version is {name} {latest}! Please note that the LSS-Manager can only use this browser from version {supported} supports. This has reasons of security and compatibility. You can download the latest version of your browser at here download.
A current list of supported browsers can be found in our FAQ.
old.title: Outdated Browser

info.close: Do not show this note again
info.text: The LSS Manager collects metadata as described in Wiki described. During development phase, collection cannot be stopped!
info.title: Information on the collection of metadata
